issue_name: Denial of Service Vulnerability in Profinet Devices

1.command: Update to V4.6 Patch 01 or later version
1.description: Update the EK-ERTEC 200P to V4.6 Patch 01 or later version.

2.command: Update to V1.2.0 or later version
2.description: Update the SIMATIC CFU PA to V1.2.0 or later version.
